title: .... Riot are you still alive ?
body:
MY rp is ready for like 3 weeks for the new Lux Skin
Can i Know if the skin coming today or not cus i'll be so mad 
i'm already salty AF

replies.body: It usually comes out the Friday after the patch, so tomorrow my friend! However if it doesn't then we could unfortunately be waiting another 3 - 5 days for it ;(
